scenes.background: Monica and Bob are on a video call with you.
scenes.description: Thanks for agreeing to another meeting. How about we start at 9 AM?

options.text: AM works for me. I'll see you then.
options.analysis: You agreed to the early meeting time, demonstrating empathy and motivation, but potentially compromising your self-regulation.

options.text: Could we push it to 10 AM? I have something scheduled earlier.
options.analysis: You suggested a later time, showing good self-regulation and emotional perception, but empathy and motivation were lower.

options.text: AM is a bit too early for me. Could we find another time?
options.analysis: You indicated that the early meeting time was inconvenient, showing good emotional perception, though social skills could improve.
